109444.Title: Clear and Present Danger
109444.title: Clear and Present Danger
109444.cast: Harrison Ford, Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer, Joaquim de Almeida, Henry Czerny, Harris Yulin, Donald Moffat, Miguel Sandoval, Benjamin Bratt, Dean Jones, Thora Birch, James Earl Jones, Raymond Cruz
109444.description: When the president's friend is murdered, CIA Deputy Director Jack Ryan becomes unwittingly involved in an illegal war against a Colombian drug cartel.
